text:
They did an upgrade just before the Covid came. They expanded their merchandises - by  dumping them outside along the walkway outside!

Business may be better but the poor cashiers are still two per shift. Really? Maybe a few more cashier points or one on the outside?

Sigh. No wonder tge staff always looked so hassled and haggard. In fact, they hardly had time to even do upselling or suggested offsetting my Fairprice points. Other reviews may say otherwise but no one ever mentioned the rewards.

I had a very good experience from Mdm Tan Siew Poh. She really went out of her way to address problems faced with my Dad's purchase of the NTUC vouchers.
Thank you and hope to see you again!

Review September 2023
NTUC Smart Choice bread 🍞 is an essential daily item for the only outlet around the area which caters to the nearby dormitories of foreign workers on the off days . These 🍞 bread gets all sold out & unavailable for the local residents. Despite informing Fairprice the situation still offern persist .
This outlet is small yet it's space is used with non fast selling items laid everywhere.

Review: 1st June 2023
All its employees are polite and helpful.
I've been visiting other supermarkets too but never seen any compared to Mdm  Poh Siew Lan who will go through all the proper processes when as a cashier by reminding 🤔 of your discount cards 😉 & special offers . Obviously thanking every customer 🙄 too. Its Amazing 👏 😍 🙌 ❤

Review  7 June 2022 :
Frozen fillet fish stacked up with tagged stating SPECIAL @$4.95 YET charged at $7.45 .
Will wait for their excuses as usual.  As though its customers are always at fault.

Review June 2022
Cat security deployed for RATS 🐀

Review  May 2022
Invitation for Rats 🐀 🐀 🐀 🐀 🐀
Through it's open wide back door

Review April 2022
Renovation begins on the 15th April. Hopefully with much improvement .
Simple wrapped Food items to be stored inside away from Rodents.  Freezers to be on the out side . Price tags to be bigger and clearer for the aged seniors.
. A  Payment counter  may be set outside too  to avoid crowding inside .
Ridiculous. The queues are always long, with only one cashier handling everything most of the time. Cutting manpower just to save costs?

10 Apr 23’
07:17 am
In Chinese we said: 麻雀虽小 ，五脏俱全。The products assortment in the store are all your daily necessities. Stocks level on display are fully packed.

👍 👍to all the services staffs here.

Most importantly, the long service staffs here are very friendly, always reminding customers at the check out counter like: member cards, senior citizens discount matter, special promotions items etc
